short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting closing time. All responses must be submitted by March 16, 202"  ,
description: Parks Canada has a requirement for the provision of promotional items (medals) for various national historic sites across Canada as part of the The Parks Canada Xplorers Program. The initial order must be delivered by May 10, 2023. This is a request for proposals against PSPC supply arrangement (SA)    #EN578-191297. Only the proposals from suppliers qualified under that SA will be considered.
